list_definition.definition: a public place where people meet to buy and sell or the public event at which this happens

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has a clothes stall in the market.

list_definition.definition: (a place where there is) a demand for certain things

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There is a market for cotton goods in hot countries.
I produce the goods and my brother markets them all over the world.
